resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107733</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107733</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uncovering Assumptions through Critical Writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufdecken von von Annahmen durch kritisches 
Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrement des prétentions par l'écriture 
critique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descobrindo suposições com a escrita crítica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scoprire i presupposti con scrittura critica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποκάλυψη των υποθέσεων μέσω του κρίσιμου γραψίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destapadura de asunciones con la escritura 
crítica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn to identify assumptions and propaganda techniques in advertisements. They will then use these techniques to create their own advertisement for a product and write a business letter persuading a company to produce their product.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen, Annahmen und 
Propagandatechniken in den Reklameanzeigen zu kennzeichnen. Sie 
verwenden dann diese Techniken, um ihre eigene Reklameanzeige für ein
Produkt herzustellen und einen Geschäftsbrief zu schreiben, der eine 
Firma überzeugt, ihr Produkt zu produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront à identifier des 
prétentions et des techniques de propagande en annonces. Ils 
emploieront alors ces techniques pour créer leur propre publicité 
pour un produit et pour écrire une lettre commerciale persuadant une 
compagnie de produire leur produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão identificar suposições
e técnicas do propaganda nas propagandas. Usarão então estas 
técnicas criar sua própria propaganda para um produto e escrever uma
letra de negócio que persuade uma companhia produzir seu produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno identificare i presupposti
e le tecniche di propaganda in pubblicità. Allora useranno 
queste tecniche per creare la loro propria pubblicità per un prodotto
e per scrivere una lettera di affari che persaude un'azienda di 
produrre il loro prodotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν να προσδιορίζουν τις υποθέσεις
και τις τεχνικές προπαγάνδας στις διαφημίσεις. Θα 
χρησιμοποιήσουν έπειτα αυτές τις τεχνικές για να δημιουργηθεί η 
διαφήμισή τους για ένα προϊόν και να γραφτεί μια επιχειρησιακή 
επιστολή πειστικός μια επιχείρηση για να παραγάγουν το προϊόν 
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán identificar asunciones
y técnicas de la propaganda en anuncios. Entonces utilizarán 
estas técnicas para crear su propio anuncio para un producto y para 
escribir una carta comercial que persuade a una compañía producir su
producto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
